channel.title: Conquest Housing
channel.description:
Doesn't really warrant a show-off but my players seemed to like it.
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3u96gfYscW0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3u96gfYscW0[/url]
The video is old, but that was the base I worked off of, it is now added full in-game and i'm working on higher-tier housing (Pay GP for Houses).

item.title: Conquest Housing
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

marcbob:

I really like this, especially how you can spawn 1 npc in your house. That could be a big advantage and worth whatever it takes to get the house.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Conquest Housing
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“MicroZoft, post:5, topic:542879”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=661755.msg4423266#msg4423266 date=1399461869]

uhhhh ok gj i guess

Thanks, I plan on using this to build more decorative houses yielding more benefits than this basic house does.

why is the house on entrana may I ask? would be cool if you used the construct map region packet
[/quote]

this is a house, where players can build things to benefit them in-game, then change it to where they teleport when they teleport home (as Entrana is the home).

You can build things like,

Key Chest (chest used at home to redeem Tower, Gamble, and Crystal keys).
Barrow’s Chest (looted for Barrows’ items, Muddy Key can be used on it for 1 free reward).
4 Different Altars with varying effects.
Repair Table (used for building chaotics).
Dragon Bitter has a special effect in-game.
Wardrobe allows changing of outfits.
2 different Ranges for cooking, basic and x2 XP Range
Also outside is a monster spawn where you can choose from the NPCs shown in the video, they will spawn for you to kill.

This is just the first home I plan on adding bigger more detailed houses using this base.[/quote]
Ahh I see, good luck

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“lare69, post:4, topic:542879”][quote author=MicroZoft link=topic=661755.msg4423237#msg4423237 date=1399440664]

uhhhh ok gj i guess

Thanks, I plan on using this to build more decorative houses yielding more benefits than this basic house does.
[/quote]
why is the house on entrana may I ask? would be cool if you used the construct map region packet[/quote]

this is a house, where players can build things to benefit them in-game, then change it to where they teleport when they teleport home (as Entrana is the home).

You can build things like,

Key Chest (chest used at home to redeem Tower, Gamble, and Crystal keys).
Barrow’s Chest (looted for Barrows’ items, Muddy Key can be used on it for 1 free reward).
4 Different Altars with varying effects.
Repair Table (used for building chaotics).
Dragon Bitter has a special effect in-game.
Wardrobe allows changing of outfits.
2 different Ranges for cooking, basic and x2 XP Range
Also outside is a monster spawn where you can choose from the NPCs shown in the video, they will spawn for you to kill.

This is just the first home I plan on adding bigger more detailed houses using this base.
